buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: Clip-path cut corners, NOT border-radius. Uppercase, letter-spacing, Orbitron font.

props.variant: Visual style variant of the button
props.disabled: Disables interaction and applies muted styling
props.loading: Shows spinning diamond loader and disables click
props.icon: Optional icon element rendered before label

keyboard.tab: Move focus to the next focusable element
keyboard.shift_tab: Move focus to the previous focusable element

api.clip_corner: Applies the signature Endfield clipped corner polygon via clip-path. Use on any rectangular element.
api.hover_brightness_110: Standard hover brightening for primary buttons. Pair with shadow glow for full effect.
api.active_brightness_90: Press-down darkening effect for tactile feedback.

cards.title: Cards
cards.description: Corner brackets signature element. Hover: translateY(-4px), yellow border tint, shadow.

props.selected: Shows selected state with primary border highlight
props.disabled: Reduces opacity and disables pointer events
props.hoverable: Enables lift and glow hover animation
props.onClick: Makes the card clickable with cursor pointer

api.corner_brackets: Adds ::before and ::after pseudo-elements creating the signature Endfield corner bracket decoration (24px, primary color at 0.4 opacity).
api.hover_translate_y: Lifts the card 4px on hover for depth effect. Combine with shadow and border color transition.

cards.content_card_desc: Standard content layout with media slot, overline, title, and body text.
cards.feature_card_desc: Icon-first card for features or capabilities. No media block.
cards.playground_desc: Description text lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

forms.title: Forms & Input
forms.description: Label: Orbitron 12px uppercase. Focus: yellow border + glow ring. Error: red border.

props.label: Field label displayed in Orbitron uppercase
props.required: Shows red asterisk and enables validation
props.error: Error message — triggers red border and glow
props.helperText: Subtle hint text below the input
props.disabled: Disables the input with muted styling

keyboard.tab: Move focus to the next form field
keyboard.shift_tab: Move focus to the previous form field
keyboard.enter: Submit the form or toggle checkbox

api.focus_border_primary: Applies yellow border on focus. Always pair with focus:shadow glow ring for the complete Endfield focus style.
api.border_ef_red: Red border for validation errors. Combine with shadow-[0_0_0_3px_rgba(255,71,87,0.1)] for the error glow.

forms.error_username: ✕ Username must be at least 3 characters.

navigation.header_description: Fixed, blur backdrop, 64px height. Nav link: Orbitron, uppercase, diamond indicator on active.
navigation.sidebar_description: Width 280px, fixed. Section label: Orbitron 11px uppercase. Active: yellow left border.
navigation.tabs_description: Orbitron 13px, uppercase. Active: yellow text + yellow bottom border.
navigation.breadcrumb_description: Item: Orbitron, 12px, uppercase. Separator: ›. Current: no link, font-weight 600.
navigation.pagination_description: Diamond markers. Orbitron font. Active: yellow bg, black text.

header_api.useScrollDirection: Hook to auto-hide header on scroll down and reveal on scroll up.

sidebar_props.activeId: Currently active item ID for highlight
sidebar_props.onNavigate: Callback when a nav item is clicked

tabs_keyboard.home: Move focus to the first tab
tabs_keyboard.end: Move focus to the last tab

breadcrumb_props.items: Breadcrumb path items, last item is current page

pagination_props.siblingCount: Number of sibling pages shown around current

navigation.overview_content: Tab panel content for Overview section. Padding 24px 0.

footer.title: Footer
footer.description: Background canvas, border-top. 3-column grid. Column title: Orbitron 12px uppercase.
